mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id AS order_id, o.created_at AS order_date, u.user_name AS user_name, od.quantity AS quantity, stl.amount AS total_amount, CASE o.order_status WHEN 1 THEN 'PLACED' WHEN 2 THEN 'SHIPPED' WHEN 3 THEN 'DELIVERED' WHEN 4 THEN 'CANCELLED' ELSE 'UNKNOWN' END AS order_status FROM ORDERS o JOIN ORDER_DETAIL od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN SALES_TRANSACTION_LOG stl ON od.order_detail_id = stl.order_detail_id AND stl.transaction_type = 1 JOIN USER u ON o.user_id = u.user_id WHERE od.product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY o.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDERS o JOIN ORDER_DETAIL od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN SALES_TRANSACTION_LOG stl ON od.order_detail_id = stl.order_detail_id AND stl.transaction_type = 1 JOIN USER u ON o.user_id = u.user_id WHERE od.product_id = #{productId}
